languages.text: Коллекция старинного оружия. Хоть больше оно не годится для боя, его вид вдохновляет на подвиг праведников.

traits.locale_text: Коллекция старинного оружия. Хоть больше оно не годится для боя, его вид вдохновляет на подвиг праведников.

languages.text: A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.
languages.original_text: Коллекция старинного оружия. Хоть больше оно не годится для боя, его вид вдохновляет на подвиг праведников.

traits.locale_text: A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.
A collection of exquisitely crafted weapons. Each looks so precious it could buy a voidship.
A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.
Under the thick glass cover lies a partly fused bionic hand prosthesis, its fingers frozen in a death grip.
A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.
A collection of exquisitely crafted weapons. Each looks so precious it could buy a voidship.

A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.

languages.text: Una colección de armas antiguas. Aunque ya no son aptas para el combate, su imagen inspira a las almas justas a realizar hazañas gloriosas.
languages.original_text: A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.

traits.locale_text: Una colección de armas antiguas. Aunque ya no son aptas para el combate, su imagen inspira a las almas justas a realizar hazañas gloriosas.
Bajo la gruesa cubierta de cristal descansa una prótesis de manio biónica parcialmente fusionada, con los dedos congelados en un poderoso agarre.

languages.text: アンティーク武器のコレクション。もはや戦闘には適さないが、その姿は正義の魂を新たな栄光へと鼓舞し続ける。
languages.original_text: A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.

traits.locale_text: アンティーク武器のコレクション。もはや戦闘には適さないが、その姿は正義の魂を新たな栄光へと鼓舞し続ける。
分厚いガラス製の覆いの下には、部分的に融合したバイオニック義手があり、その指は死の形に固まっている。

languages.text: 各种各样的古董武器，尽管这些武器已经不再适合继续战斗，但它们依然见证、激励着正义的灵魂创造新的荣耀。
languages.original_text: A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.

traits.locale_text: 各种各样的古董武器，尽管这些武器已经不再适合继续战斗，但它们依然见证、激励着正义的灵魂创造新的荣耀。
厚厚的玻璃罩下面，放置着一条部分熔融的假手，手指的部分被牢牢冻住。

languages.text: Eine Sammlung antiquierter Waffen. Sie eignen sich zwar nicht mehr für den Kampf, aber ihr Anblick inspiriert rechtschaffene Seelen bis heute zu Ruhmestaten.
languages.original_text: A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.

traits.locale_text: Eine Sammlung antiquierter Waffen. Sie eignen sich zwar nicht mehr für den Kampf, aber ihr Anblick inspiriert rechtschaffene Seelen bis heute zu Ruhmestaten.
Unter der dicken Glasabdeckung liegt eine teilweise fusionierte, bionische Handprothese, deren Finger zu einem Todesgriff eingefroren sind.

languages.text: Une collection d'armes anciennes. Si elles ne sont plus en état de servir au combat, leur seule vue continue à inciter les âmes valeureuses à multiplier les hauts faits héroïques.
languages.original_text: A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.

traits.locale_text: Une collection d'armes anciennes. Si elles ne sont plus en état de servir au combat, leur seule vue continue à inciter les âmes valeureuses à multiplier les hauts faits héroïques.
Sous l'épaisse protection de verre repose une prothèse de main bionique partiellement fusionnée, les doigts refermés sur eux-mêmes.

languages.text: Antika silahlarla dolu bir koleksiyon. Fakat bu silahlar, artık savaşa uygun değiller. Yine de görünüşleriyle şan dolu yeni başarılara imza atmaları için erdemli ruhlara ilham kaynağı olmaya devam ediyorlar.
languages.original_text: A collection of antique weapons. Though they are no longer fit for battle, their sight continues to inspire righteous souls to new feats of glory.
